## PopulatableStabilio.approveXbrlWethUniTokens() method

Allow the liquidity mining contract to use Uniswap XBRL/STBL LP tokens for [staking](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.stakexbrlstblunitokens.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
approveXbrlWethUniTokens(allowance?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedStabilioTransaction<P, SentStabilioTransaction<S, StabilioReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  allowance | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum amount of LP tokens that will be transferrable to liquidity mining (<code>2^256 - 1</code> by default). |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.populatedstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.sentstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [StabilioReceipt](./lib-base.stabilioreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Must be performed before calling [stakeXbrlStblUniTokens()](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.stakexbrlstblunitokens.md)<!-- -->.
